pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vroom: license plate parser=========================================================**vroom** provides tools for identifying license plates in text.Basic usage-----------.. code:: python from vroom import plates_parser parser = plates_parser.Parser() plates_string = "Lorem ipsum SY12345 dolor sit amet, SK 1A234 consectetur adipiscing elit STA12AA" found_plates = parser.findall_plates(plates_string) print(found_plates) single_plate = "SY12345" plate_info = parser.match_plate(single_plate) print(single_plate)Currently supported countries-----------------------------* Poland [PL] (`source <http://prawo.sejm.gov.pl/isap.nsf/download.xsp/WDU20120000585/O/D20120585.pdf>`_)
